mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.certificate_number certificateNumber, a.`name` certificateName, a.issue_organ issueOrgan, a.validity_type validityType, DATE_FORMAT(a.issue_time,'%Y-%m-%d') issueTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.validity_time, '%Y-%m-%d') validityTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` certificateTypeName FROM sys_staff_certificate a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND a.certificate_number LIKE '%${certificateNumber}%'
AND a.`name` LIKE '%${certificateName}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_certificate (id, certificate_number, `name`, type_id, issue_time, issue_organ, validity_type, validity_time, enclosure, staff_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{certificateNumber}, #{certificateName}, #{typeId}, #{issueTime}, #{issueOrgan}, #{validityType}, #{validityTime}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{staffId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.certificate_number certificateNumber, a.`name` certificateName, a.issue_organ issueOrgan, a.validity_type validityType, DATE_FORMAT(a.issue_time,'%Y-%m-%d') issueTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.validity_time, '%Y-%m-%d') validityTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, a.type_id typeId, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` certificateTypeName FROM sys_staff_certificate a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.certificate_number certificateNumber, a.`name` certificateName, a.issue_organ issueOrgan, a.validity_type validityType, DATE_FORMAT(a.issue_time,'%Y-%m-%d') issueTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.validity_time, '%Y-%m-%d') validityTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` certificateTypeName FROM sys_staff_certificate a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND b.id = #{staffId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
